meanings.definition: A valuable object that has belonged to a family for several generations.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother's heirlooms are precious to our family.
meanings.sent2: Heirlooms like antique jewelry often hold sentimental value.
meanings.sent3: The heirlooms in our attic tell stories of our ancestors.
meanings.sent4: Her heirlooms were like time capsules from the past.
meanings.sent5: The heirlooms gleamed with history and memories.

meanings.definition: Something of special value handed down from one generation to another.
meanings.sent1: The heirlooms passed down to me are treasured possessions.
meanings.sent2: Family heirlooms carry the legacy of our loved ones.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally broke the heirlooms, but luckily they were repaired.
meanings.sent4: The heirlooms symbolize the enduring bond within our family.
meanings.sent5: The heirlooms whispered tales of the past to me.
